overview:
Todd leads the sales and marketing efforts at Whodini.

Previously, Todd was Managing Director of TLP Ventures LLC which invested in a variety of software and home improvement start-ups. Prior to that, Todd was CEO of Intelli-Check Inc., a public company focused on identity systems. Todd was also Director of Business Development at Trex Communications. Todd received his BSM from Tulane Universityâ€™s AB Freeman School of Business.

In his spare time, Todd is an avid golf and tennis player and enjoys traveling. Todd is married with two children.
